column4: what do you mean by better image? and the task bar is an optional component in enlightenment and you should be able to set it up through one of the settings menu items
image quality .. gnome seems more "shining" better colors .. maybe its just me :S dunno
I think that has more to do with the images used - it is designed to be fast and efficient (which could lower the image quality a bit, though ive never noticed it)
